topic.title: Records rejected in ASN.1 Encoder Node

body.p: If a record cannot be encoded with the given ASN.1 schema in ASN.1 Encoder Node, it is rejected and stored within the Data Refinery rejected storage. The rejected storage is located on the pod where the specific Output stream is running, under directory /opt/comptel/eventlink/base/status/streams/<streamName>/nodes/VZ_SPS_CFG_ENCODER/rejected/DEFAULT/. The rejected records are stored in sub-directories based on rejection time.
A file may be examined with rejected records by running the following command:
The content of the records is shown in Data Refinery internal format, including the reason for rejection at the end of every rejected record.
